title.en: Totsuon! - Totsuzen Onnanonko ni Natta no de, Ore no Oppai Monde Mimasen ka?

altTitles.en: Since I've Abruptly Turned Into a Girl, Won't You Fondle My Boobs?
とつおん! 突然女の子になったので、俺のおっぱい揉んでみませんか?

description.en:
Sakio grew up as a tiny but cute femboy, and for that, he was always bullied by his brother, who is taller, stronger, and smarter.  
  
One night, due to an unknown phenomenon he turns into a girl, which he keeps a secret from others.  
But little by little, people begin to notice something different about him and begin to take notice of his gender change.  
  
And because he is such a weakling, he can't refuse when others ask him for sex– including his best friend, his classmates, his delinquent brother, and even his cute childhood friend, Michiru-chan (who grew a dick from her crotch).
